title: Virtual Meet & Greet
description: Host a virtual meet and greet with team players or brand ambassadors
implementation: Use video conferencing tools to host scheduled sessions where fans can interact with players or brand representatives
example: The LA Lakers hosted a series of virtual meet and greets during the pandemic, allowing fans to ask questions and get personalized responses from players

title: User-Generated Content Contest
description: Run a contest where fans submit content related to your brand/team
implementation: Create a branded hashtag, promote across social channels, and select winners for prizes
example: Nike's #JustDoIt campaign encourages users to share their athletic achievements, generating millions of authentic content pieces

title: AR Team Photo Experience
description: Create an AR filter that lets fans take virtual photos with the team
implementation: Develop a custom AR filter for Instagram/Snapchat/TikTok that places users in team photos
example: The NBA created an AR experience that allowed fans to virtually stand next to life-sized NBA players

title: Community Charity Event
description: Organize an event where fans and team members collaborate on a charity project
implementation: Partner with a local charity, create volunteer opportunities for fans alongside team members
example: The Seattle Seahawks regularly host community cleanup events where players and fans work together to beautify local neighborhoods

title: Exclusive Content Subscription
description: Create a premium content tier with behind-the-scenes footage, interviews, etc.
implementation: Develop a content plan, set up a subscription platform, and produce exclusive content
example: Manchester United's MUTV offers subscribers exclusive interviews, full match replays, and behind-the-scenes content

title: Fan Strategy Summit
description: Host a fantasy sports-style event where fans suggest plays/strategies
implementation: Create a structured format where fans can present strategy ideas to coaches or analysts
example: The Dallas Mavericks hosted a fan strategy session where selected fans presented play ideas to assistant coaches

title: Custom Merchandise Creator
description: Online tool allowing fans to customize team merchandise
implementation: Develop a customization platform and set up production logistics
example: The New York Yankees offer a custom jersey creator that allows fans to add their name and choose numbers

title: Virtual Watch Party
description: Hosted online event where fans watch games together with commentary
implementation: Set up a streaming platform with chat functionality and host live commentary
example: The Golden State Warriors hosted virtual watch parties during away games, featuring former players providing commentary

title: Fan Appreciation Wall
description: Physical or digital wall featuring fan photos, stories, and testimonials
implementation: Create a submission process, curate content, and design the display
example: The Green Bay Packers Hall of Fame features a digital wall of fan stories spanning generations of supporters

title: Interactive Mobile Game
description: Branded mobile game that incorporates team elements and players
implementation: Develop a game (in-house or outsourced) and distribute via app stores
example: The NFL created the Madden mobile game, allowing fans to manage teams featuring their favorite players
